title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for November 7, 2024
description: All solutions for the November 7 episode. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for November 7, 2024 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here is the answer to the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle for November 7, 2024, plus the solutions to the other puzzles in the game.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Below you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer for November 7, 2024. We’ve also got you covered if you want to know the solutions for all the other puzzles in today’s game. This also includes all the toss-ups. That said, we’re beginning to notice that many of the puzzles this season have been quite short in length. At any rate, the contestants for tonight’s episode are Marc Rosenthal, Kristin Cook, and Mary Daigre. As a reminder, Celebrity Wheel of Fortune with Pat Sajak will make a comeback on December 2 for a single episode before the full season begins some time next year. That should provide a good balance between the old and the new. Here are all of the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for November 7. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Thursday, November 7, 2024 and the categories (in parentheses) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – OFFICE BUILDINGS (Places) Tossup #1 – GUIDED WALKING TOUR (Event) Tossup #2 – SPORTS ARENA (Place) Regular Puzzle #1 – SEATTLE, SAVANNAH, SACRAMENTO (Same Letter) Regular Puzzle #2 – LIVE FROM NEW YORK, IT’S SATURDAY NIGHT! (TV Quote) Regular Puzzle #3 – SO MUCH TO DO, SO LITTLE TIME (Phrase) Tossup #3 – HANGING OUT WITH FRIENDS (What Are You Doing?) Tossup #4 – STAYING UP TOO LATE (What Are You Doing?) Tossup #5 – FORGETTING TO SET MY ALARM (What Are You Doing?) Regular Puzzle #4 – THEATRICAL PERFORMANCE (Showbiz) As a recap of yesterday’s episode, here are the puzzle answers for Wednesday, November 6: Bonus Round Puzzle – MAKING THE ROUNDS (What Are You Doing?) Tossup #1 – BACKSTAGE PAGE (Showbiz) Tossup #2 – LIFE IN THE FAST LANE (Song Title) Regular Puzzle #1 – DALLAS, HOUSTON & LUBBOCK, TEXAS (On the Map) Regular Puzzle #2 – SISTER, LEBOWSKI, SHOT, EASY (Crossword: Big ____?) Regular Puzzle #3 – WALKING ACROSS THE BROOKLYN BRIDGE (What Are You Doing?) Tossup #3 – THE CRACK OF DAWN (Event) Tossup #4 – SPECTACULAR SUNSET (Event) Tossup #5 – TOTAL SOLAR ECLIPSE (Event) Regular Puzzle #4 – IT ALL ADDS UP (Phrase) The Fan Friday contest is still live and a new word for the sweepstakes will be available on November 8 later this week.
html:
Below you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer for November 7, 2024. We’ve also got you covered if you want to know the solutions for all the other puzzles in today’s game. This also includes all the toss-ups. That said, we’re beginning to notice that many of the puzzles this season have been quite short in length.

At any rate, the contestants for tonight’s episode are Marc Rosenthal, Kristin Cook, and Mary Daigre. As a reminder, Celebrity Wheel of Fortune with Pat Sajak will make a comeback on December 2 for a single episode before the full season begins some time next year. That should provide a good balance between the old and the new. Here are all of the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for November 7.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Thursday, November 7, 2024 and the categories (in parentheses) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – OFFICE BUILDINGS (Places)
  • Tossup #1 – GUIDED WALKING TOUR (Event)
  • Tossup #2 – SPORTS ARENA (Place)
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – SEATTLE, SAVANNAH, SACRAMENTO (Same Letter)
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – LIVE FROM NEW YORK, IT’S SATURDAY NIGHT! (TV Quote)
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – SO MUCH TO DO, SO LITTLE TIME (Phrase)
  • Tossup #3 – HANGING OUT WITH FRIENDS (What Are You Doing?)
  • Tossup #4 – STAYING UP TOO LATE (What Are You Doing?)
  • Tossup #5 – FORGETTING TO SET MY ALARM (What Are You Doing?)
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – THEATRICAL PERFORMANCE (Showbiz)

As a recap of yesterday’s episode, here are the puzzle answers for Wednesday, November 6:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – MAKING THE ROUNDS (What Are You Doing?)
  • Tossup #1 – BACKSTAGE PAGE (Showbiz)
  • Tossup #2 – LIFE IN THE FAST LANE (Song Title)
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – DALLAS, HOUSTON & LUBBOCK, TEXAS (On the Map)
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – SISTER, LEBOWSKI, SHOT, EASY (Crossword: Big ____?)
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – WALKING ACROSS THE BROOKLYN BRIDGE (What Are You Doing?)
  • Tossup #3 – THE CRACK OF DAWN (Event)
  • Tossup #4 – SPECTACULAR SUNSET (Event)
  • Tossup #5 – TOTAL SOLAR ECLIPSE (Event)
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – IT ALL ADDS UP (Phrase)

The Fan Friday contest is still live and a new word for the sweepstakes will be available on November 8 later this week.
